    • Uses of ProvBuilder in org.mitre.provenance.plusobject.builder

      Methods in org.mitre.provenance.plusobject.builder that return ProvBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.excise(ProvBuilder items)
      Same as excise(items, false)
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.excise(ProvBuilder items, boolean removeWorkflows)
      Remove all items found in one builder from this, and returns a new builder.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.findLinks(String headName, String tailName)
      Returns a new builder containing only those edges that go between nodes named headName, and nodes named tailName.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.generate(NodeTemplate tmpl, String varName, String varValue)
      Generates an instance of a ProvBuilder, by substituting varValue for a variable named varName in the specified template.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.generate(NodeTemplate tmpl, String varName, String varValue, PLUSActor owner)
      Generates an instance of a ProvBuilder, by substituting varValue for a variable named varName in the specified template.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.link(ProvenanceCollection heads, ProvenanceCollection tails)
      Create new PLUSEdges between all nodes of heads and all nodes of tails.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.link(String headName, String tailName)
      Link the first object found under headName with the first object found under tailName
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.merge(ProvBuilder... builders)
      Combine all the provided builders into the current one, modifying the current one.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.mostRecent()
      Find the most recent node (by creation date) and return a new builder containing only that node.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newActorNamed(String name)
      Create a new actor in the local database, and return a builder containing that actor.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newDataNamed(String name, PLUSActor owner, String... metadataKeyValuePairs)
      Create a new data item with the given name and owner.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newDataNamed(String name, String... metadataKeyValuePairs)
      Create a new data item with the given name.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newEmpty()
      Return a new provenance builder with the same settings as this one, but empty.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newInvocationNamed(String name, PLUSActor owner, String... metadataKeyValuePairs)
      Create a new invocation with the specified name, owner, and metadata.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newInvocationNamed(String name, String... metadataKeyValuePairs)
      Create a new invocation with the specified name and metadata.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newWorkflowNamed(String name) 
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.newWorkflowNamed(String name, PLUSActor owner) 
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.nodeNamed(String name)
      Find a node with the given name in the current ProvBuilder, and return a new builder containing only that node.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.nodesMatching(String pattern)
      Find nodes whose names match a patter, and return that as a new builder.
      ProvBuilder ProvBuilder.setUser(User viewer)
      Modify the user that is the viewer of this builder.

      Constructors in org.mitre.provenance.plusobject.builder with parameters of type ProvBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      ProvBuilder(ProvBuilder... builders)
